summary: My Belgavi - A comprehensive smart city application for Belagavi featuring civic services, complaint management, traffic/transport info, emergency services, utilities dashboard, citizen engagement, tourism guide, business/jobs section, digital payments, AI-powered alerts, and city official dashboards
architectural_notes: Integration needed with Belagavi City Corporation APIs
GPS location services for complaint tracking and emergency features
UPI payment gateway integration for municipal services
Real-time data feeds for traffic, weather, and utilities
Photo upload and storage system for complaints
Push notification system for alerts and updates
Blockchain infrastructure for complaint tracking transparency
AI/ML components for chatbot, traffic prediction, and complaint classification
Separate admin dashboard for city officials with analytics
known_issues: Live GPS vehicle tracking not functioning on transport map

existing_features.title: Create a civic services module that allows users to view and access property tax payment, water bill payment, electricity bill links (HESCOM), trade license renewal, and birth & death certificate services with placeholder integration points for Belagavi City Corporation
Implement a grievance and complaint registration system where users can submit complaints, receive unique tracking numbers, and view complaint status
Add rating functionality to the complaint system where users can rate resolved complaints on a scale (e.g., 1-5 stars) after resolution
Create a live traffic and transport section displaying bus timings (NWKRTC), auto/taxi contact directory, parking availability information, and EV charging stations map with placeholder data
Implement an emergency services module with a prominent one-tap emergency button and contact lists for police stations, nearby hospitals, fire stations, and blood banks in Belagavi
Create a smart utilities dashboard showing water supply schedule, power cut alerts, garbage collection schedule, and weather updates for Belagavi
Build a citizen engagement section featuring polls and surveys, public event notifications, local news updates, volunteer opportunities, and a community discussion forum
Create a tourism and city guide featuring Belagavi tourist places (Belagavi Fort, Gokak Falls, Kapileshwar Temple), hotel directory, restaurant guide, local markets info, and historical information
Implement a business and jobs section with local business listings, startup support information, job postings, internship opportunities, and skill training center details
Create a digital payments section with placeholders for UPI integration, municipal fine payment, parking fee payment, and event ticket booking
Implement a smart alerts system displaying flood alerts, air quality index, and push notification placeholders for weather and utility updates
Build a city official dashboard accessible to admin users that displays complaint analytics, data visualizations, complaint heatmap by type and location, and smart city KPI tracking metrics
Create a user authentication system using Internet Identity integration for citizen digital ID login

Implement a responsive navigation structure that organizes all features into logical sections accessible from a main menu with clear categorization for civic services, complaints, transport, emergencies, utilities, engagement, tourism, business, payments, alerts, and admin dashboard

Design and generate a consistent visual theme for the app that reflects a modern smart city aesthetic with Indian government service inspiration, using professional colors and clean typography that works well for civic engagement, avoiding blue and purple

Create a home page that serves as the main dashboard, featuring quick access cards to key services (emergency button, file complaint, utilities, payments), recent alerts, and featured tourist attractions

Render generated image assets including app logo, smart city hero banner, emergency services icon, tourism place photos (Belagavi Fort, Gokak Falls, Kapileshwar Temple), and section icons as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Add real-time GPS location tracking to the complaint submission form that captures the user's current location coordinates (latitude/longitude) when filing a complaint
Display complaint location on a map view in the complaint tracking interface so users can see where their submitted complaints are located
Add real-time status tracking for complaints that shows live updates when complaint status changes from Pending to In Progress to Resolved
Create a train schedule section in the transport page displaying train timings, routes, and station information for trains serving Belagavi
Integrate Google Maps component into the transport page to display an interactive map showing train stations, parking locations, and EV charging stations in Belagavi
Expand the tourism places section by adding at least 5 new tourist attractions beyond the existing Belagavi Fort, Gokak Falls, and Kapileshwar Temple locations
Enhance the train schedule display on the transport page with improved visual layout, filtering capabilities, and detailed route information for all train routes serving Belagavi
Render generated images for the new tourism places as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Fix the train schedule display on the transport page so that train routes and timings are properly shown to users
Add live GPS vehicle tracking functionality that displays moving vehicles on the Google Maps component in the transport page
Convert the home page into a login-first landing page that requires Internet Identity authentication before users can access any app features

Debug and fix the live GPS vehicle tracking functionality in the TransportMap component so that vehicle locations are properly fetched from the backend and displayed as moving markers on the Google Maps interface
Verify that the backend getVehicleLocations query is properly returning vehicle location data and that the frontend useQueries hook is correctly configured to fetch this data
Ensure the Google Maps API integration in TransportMap.tsx properly handles dynamic vehicle marker updates including adding, updating, and removing markers as vehicle locations change

Debug and fix the live GPS vehicle tracking in TransportMap.tsx so that vehicle locations are fetched from the backend getVehicleLocations query and displayed as moving markers on the Google Maps interface with proper automatic updates
Ensure the frontend useQueries hook in useQueries.ts properly configures the vehicle locations query with appropriate refetch intervals (e.g., every 5 seconds) and error handling
Fix the Google Maps marker management in TransportMap.tsx to properly add, update, and remove vehicle markers as location data changes, ensuring markers move smoothly without duplicates
Connect the frontend to call addOrUpdateVehicleLocation backend function and enable periodic vehicle location updates to show movement on the transport map

new_feature_requests.summary: Civic services integration (property tax, water/electricity bills, licenses, certificates, grievances)
Smart complaint system with photo upload, GPS tagging, tracking, and ratings
Live traffic & transport (bus timings, parking, EV stations, taxi directory)
Emergency services with one-tap button and nearby facility listings
Smart utilities dashboard (water schedule, power alerts, garbage collection, weather)
Citizen engagement (polls, events, news, volunteers, community forum)
Tourism & city guide with places, hotels, restaurants, and historical info
Business & jobs section (listings, startups, jobs, internships, training)
Digital payments integration (UPI, fines, parking, tickets)
Smart alerts & AI features (flood/air quality alerts, bilingual chatbot, AI classification)
Advanced features (citizen digital ID, QR verification, blockchain tracking, SOS)
City official dashboard with analytics, complaint heatmap, and KPI tracking

Build a smart complaint system that allows users to upload a photo of an issue (pothole, garbage, streetlight), add a description, and submit the complaint with status tracking (Pending, In Progress, Resolved)
Live tracking and GPS tracking feature
Train schedule information
Add Google Maps integration to the app
Expand tourism places section with additional tourist attractions beyond initial three locations
Add train route schedules and details for Belagavi to Kalburgi, Hubballi, Goa, Bengaluru, and Mysore
Convert front page to a login page with authentication before accessing main app features
Add live GPS vehicle tracking with vehicles displayed on the map
Add a backend update function addOrUpdateVehicleLocation that accepts vehicle ID, latitude, longitude, and timestamp to enable real-time GPS location updates for vehicles
Enhance the train schedule display on the transport page with comprehensive schedule information, improved visual layout, and better filtering capabilities
